document.full_text: rafa nadal suffered a severe fright before punching the air with both fists in joy as he began his french open defense on tuesday with a dogged win over john isner, while fit-again kim clijsters sauntered through her first match.
document.title: nadal and clijsters enjoy contrasting wins
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal suffered a severe fright before punching the air with both fists in joy as he began his french open defense on tuesday with a dogged win over john isner, while fit-again kim clijsters sauntered through her first match.
